question: How much is Task Bud?
Answer: Task Bud is completely free and offers premium resourcs at no charge!

question: How do I get started?
Answer: Sign up for an account and start adding tasks to your to-do list!

question: How do I add tasks?
Answer: Simply click on the 'Add Task' button and enter your task details!

question: How do I edit tasks?
Answer: Click on the task you wish to edit and click on the 'Edit' button!

question: How do I delete tasks?
Answer: Click on the task you wish to delete and click on the 'Delete' button!

question: How do I mark tasks as complete?
Answer: Click on the task you wish to mark as complete and click on the 'Mark as Complete' button!

question: How do I mark tasks as incomplete?
Answer: Click on the task you wish to mark as incomplete and click on the 'Mark as Incomplete' button!

question: How do I view tasks?
Answer: Click on the 'View Tasks' button and you will be taken to a page where you can view all of your tasks!

question: How do I view completed tasks?
Answer: Click on the 'View Completed Tasks' button and you will be taken to a page where you can view all of your completed tasks!

question: How do I view tasks by category?
Answer: Click on the 'View Tasks by Category' button and you will be taken to a page where you can view all of your tasks by category!

question: How do I view completed tasks by category?
Answer: Click on the 'View Completed Tasks by Category' button and you will be taken to a page where you can view all of your completed tasks by category!
